item.title: [B][COLOR cyan]1445 - [/COLOR][/B]Premier League: Goal Rush
item.summary: Premier League Goal Rush - Don't miss a second of the round's best Premier League action, as Goal Rush brings you from match to match.

item.title: [B][COLOR cyan]1500 - [/COLOR][/B]Liverpool v Leicester City
item.summary: Liverpool v. Leicester City - Liverpool, who are unbeaten in their last 11 games, welcome Leicester City into Anfield for a tilt in Matchday 21.

item.title: [B][COLOR cyan]1500 - [/COLOR][/B]Watford v Swansea City (NO VPN NEEDED)
item.summary: Watford v. Swansea City - Following a win over Leicester City, Watford play host to Swansea City at Vicarage Road. Watch on NBC Sports Gold.

item.title: [B][COLOR cyan]1500 - [/COLOR][/B]Newcastle v Brighton (NO VPN NEEDED)
item.summary: Newcastle v. Brighton - Newcastle and Brighton go head-to-head at St. James' Park in a Matchday 21 showdown. Watch on NBC Sports Gold.

item.title: [B][COLOR cyan]1500 - [/COLOR][/B]Chelsea v Stoke City
item.summary: Chelsea v. Stoke City - Chelsea look to secure their fourth win in five games as they play host to Stoke City at Stamford Bridge in Matchday 21.
